item.title: 中国 "坚决反对 "零或负铜处理费
item.description: 一位高级官员周三表示，中国 "坚决反对 "对铜产业征收零或负的处理费和精炼费。【原文：China “firmly opposes” zero or negative treatment and refining charges for the copper industry, a senior official said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行认为金融条件宽松，提醒注意估值风险
item.description: 储备银行的一位高级官员说，全球市场的低风险溢价使澳大利亚的金融条件比原来更加宽松，他警告说，估值过高使市场容易出现大幅调整。【原文：Low risk premiums in global markets have kept Australia’s financial conditions easier than they otherwise would be, a senior Reserve Bank official said, warning that stretched valuations leave markets vulnerable to sharp corrections.】

item.title: 卡尼的管道赌局取决于不列颠哥伦比亚省和有缺陷的碳市场
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）表示，加拿大政府正在与阿尔伯塔省谈判一项协议，为未来建设一条通往加拿大西海岸的新石油管道 "创造必要条件"。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney said his government is negotiating an agreement with Alberta that “creates necessary conditions” for the future construction of a new oil pipeline to Canada’s west coast.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡保持政策利率稳定，经济复苏步伐加快
item.description: 斯里兰卡央行连续第三次会议维持基准利率不变，以帮助通胀率回归目标，同时支持经济增长轨迹。【原文：Sri Lanka’s central bank left its benchmark rate unchanged for a third straight meeting to help inflation return to target while supporting the economy’s growth trajectory.】

item.title: 软银完成对芯片制造商 Ampere Computing 的收购
item.description: 软银集团完成了对美国芯片初创公司 Ampere Computing LLC 的 65 亿美元收购，为其进军人工智能硬件领域再添一笔资产。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. completed its $6.5 billion purchase of US chip startup Ampere Computing LLC, adding another asset to aid its push into AI hardware.】

item.title: 万科暴跌令中国房地产危机再成焦点
item.description: 中国房地产市场正在为国家支持的中国万科集团公司（China Vanke Co.【原文：China’s property market is bracing for a worsening crisis at state-backed China Vanke Co., as the builder struggles to convince investors it can avoid default in the months ahead without clearer signs of government support.】

item.title: 新西兰降低关键利率助推经济复苏
item.description: 新西兰中央银行将利率降至三年来的新低，并为在必要时进一步放宽政策以支持新生的经济复苏敞开了大门。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank cut interest rates to a fresh three-year low and left the door open to further easing if needed to support a nascent economic recovery.】

item.title: Robinhood 和 Susquehanna 加剧了预测与市场的军备竞赛
item.description: Robinhood Markets Inc.和苏斯克汉纳国际集团（Susquehanna International Group）正在接管一家受监管的交易所，该交易所与现已停业的加密货币业务 FTX 有关，这为它们在快速发展的预测市场领域提供了一个强大的新立足点。【原文：Robinhood Markets Inc. and Susquehanna International Group are taking over a regulated exchange that was tied to the now-defunct crypto business FTX, giving them a powerful new foothold in the fast-growing world of prediction markets.】

item.title: 澳大利亚月度通胀率超出预期，考验澳大利亚央行
item.description: 澳大利亚 10 月份的核心通胀率高于预期，这表明储备银行将继续保持观望，因为它正试图评估经济运行是否超出其速度极限。【原文：Australia’s core inflation came in stronger than anticipated in October, suggesting the Reserve Bank will remain on the sidelines as it tries to assess whether the economy is running beyond its speed limit.】

item.title: 日本政府寻求在不惊动市场的情况下为经济刺激提供资金
item.description: 日本首相高市真奈上周公布了日本自放宽大流行病限制以来最大的一轮额外支出。现在她面临的问题是，如何在不加剧市场紧张情绪的情况下提供资金。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi unveiled Japan’s largest round of extra spending since the easing of pandemic restrictions last week. Now she faces the question of how to fund it without adding to market nervousness.】

item.title: 贝恩支持的公司将出售 23 亿美元股票，Kioxia 下挫
item.description: Kioxia Holdings Corp.的股价跳水超过12%，原因是有消息称贝恩资本（Bain Capital）支持的一家实体将抛售这家日本存储芯片制造商的股份，这激起了人们对全球人工智能相关企业估值过高的担忧。【原文：Kioxia Holdings Corp.’s shares dived more than 12% on news that a Bain Capital-backed entity will dump a stake in the Japanese memory chipmaker, stoking concerns about the lofty valuations of global AI-related firms.】

item.title: OpenAI 称聊天 GPT 不是青少年自杀身亡的罪魁祸首
item.description: 一项诉讼指控 ChatGPT 指导一名 16 岁少年自杀，OpenAI 对此进行了辩护，称聊天机器人指导这名少年寻求帮助超过 100 次。【原文：OpenAI defended itself against a lawsuit accusing ChatGPT of coaching a 16-year-old to kill himself, saying the chatbot directed the teenager to seek help more than 100 times.】

item.title: Venture Global 与东京燃气签署 20 年液化天然气供应协议
item.description: Venture Global 公司与东京煤气公司签署了一项协议，向该公司供应液化天然气，为期 20 年，这是该美国生产商与日本公司签署的第四份长期合同。【原文：Venture Global Inc. signed an agreement with Tokyo Gas Co. to supply the utility with liquefied natural gas for 20 years, the US producer’s fourth long-term contract with a Japanese company.】

item.title: 交易员权衡美国降息和乌克兰和平的希望，黄金保持稳定
item.description: 黄金变化不大，因为交易员们权衡了美国降息的前景和乌克兰可能达成的和平协议。【原文：Gold was little changed, as traders weighed the prospects of an interest-rate cut in the US against a possible peace deal in Ukraine.】

item.title: 分析师认为李书福业绩不佳，卖空者蜂拥而至
item.description: 在第三季度财报发布前，对李书福汽车公司股票的看跌押注飙升至创纪录水平，这家中国电动汽车制造商预计将录得上市以来最大的收入降幅。【原文：Bearish bets on Li Auto Inc.’s stock have surged to a record ahead of third-quarter results, where the Chinese electric-vehicle maker is forecast to post the biggest-ever revenue decline since its listing.】

item.title: 坦普尔&amp；韦伯斯特收入增长放缓，创 2016 年以来最大跌幅
item.description: 澳大利亚在线家具零售商 Temple & Webster Group Ltd. 报告销售增长放缓，股价创下九年来最大跌幅。【原文：Temple & Webster Group Ltd. shares dropped the most in nine years after the Australian online furniture retailer reported a slowdown in its sales growth.】

item.title: 特朗普称赞乌克兰协议取得进展，油价维持在近一个月低位
item.description: 有迹象表明，乌克兰和平协议取得了进展，这可能预示着取消对俄罗斯原油供应的限制。【原文：Oil steadied after closing at the lowest in a month on signs of progress toward a peace deal in Ukraine, a push that could herald the removal of curbs on Russian crude supplies just as a global glut looms.】

item.title: Enhanced Games 将在 10 亿美元的美国 SPAC 合并案中上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由亿万富翁彼得-蒂尔（Peter Thiel）支持的 "强化运动会"（Enhanced Games）正在与特殊目的收购公司 "天堂收购公司"（A Paradise Acquisition Corp.【原文：The Enhanced Games, an Olympics-style sports event that welcomes performance-enhancing drugs and backed by billionaire Peter Thiel, is in advanced talks to go public through merging with special purpose acquisition company A Paradise Acquisition Corp., people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 人工智能电路板股价飙升 530%，夫妇俩获利 90 亿美元
item.description: 当英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋今年 5 月在台湾为供应商举办私人宴会时，房间里挤满了全球电子业的一些大佬。台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：When Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang hosted a private banquet for suppliers in Taiwan in May, the room was packed with some of the biggest names in global electronics. The chairmen of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. and Hon Hai Precision Industry Co. were there, surrounded by a sea of local manufacturing titans.】

item.title: 中国人民银行押注股市下跌，中国债券未见避险需求
item.description: 中国的股市和债市正在脱钩，打破了传统上股市下跌时债市上涨的反向相关性，因为对宽松货币政策的押注退居其次。【原文：China’s stock and bond markets are decoupling, breaking the inverse correlation where debt traditionally rises when equities fall, as bets on monetary easing take a backseat.】

item.title: 价值 10 亿美元的香港捐赠基金涉足私人投资领域
item.description: 香港一所公立大学计划将其私人投资增加到捐赠投资组合的 10%左右，作为分散公共市场波动风险战略的一部分。【原文：A publicly funded university in Hong Kong plans to increase its private investments to about 10% of its endowment portfolio, as part of a strategy to diversify from volatility in public markets.】

item.title: 研究显示：中美紧张关系助推技术研究脱钩
item.description: 中美在技术研究领域的合作已持续下降到20年来的最低点，澳大利亚一家智库警告说，这种转变可能会重塑对安全和经济增长至关重要的全球创新。【原文：US-China collaboration in technology research has fallen steadily to the lowest in 20 years, a shift an Australian think tank warns could reshape global innovation vital to security and economic growth.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将因美联储减息希望而扩大涨幅：市场综述
item.description: 由于疲软的美国消费者数据提升了对美联储下月降息的押注，亚洲股市将迎来第三个上涨日，追随华尔街的类似涨势。【原文：Asian stocks were set for a third day of gains, tracking similar advances on Wall Street as weak US consumer data lifted bets of a Federal Reserve interest rate cut next month.】

item.title: 里夫斯终于要面对她那旷日持久的预算案的清算日了
item.description: 自英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）宣布其第二份预算案的日期以来的 83 天里，她告诉债券市场投资者和工党后座议员，这份预算案是为他们考虑而起草的。【原文：In the 83 days since UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves announced the date of her second budget, she’s told both bond-market investors and Labour Party backbenchers that it’s been drafted with them in mind.】

item.title: 中日纷争为中国动漫热潮蒙上阴影
item.description: 本月早些时候，影迷们挤满了广州的一家电影院观看《捉妖记》：这部动画片成为中国今年最卖座的外国电影。有些影迷甚至还穿上了 Cosplay，为自己能成为这一文化现象的一部分而兴奋不已，因为这部电影在全球范围内打破了票房纪录。【原文：Earlier this month, fans packed a Guangzhou cinema to see Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – Infinity Castle, helping to make the animated feature China’s top-grossing foreign film of the year. Some even came in cosplay, excited to be part of a cultural phenomenon that’s smashing box office records around the world.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德和 GIC 将考虑收购国家仓储房地产投资信托基金
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，布鲁克菲尔德资产管理有限公司（Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. ）和新加坡政府投资公司（GIC Pte）正在联合探讨收购在悉尼上市的国家仓储房地产投资信托基金（National Storage REIT）的可能性。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. and Singapore’s GIC Pte are jointly exploring a potential takeover of Sydney-listed National Storage REIT, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国为何减少航班，加强对日本的报复？
item.description:
在今天的 "Big Take Asia "播客中：日本新首相最近提出了支持台湾的问题；现在中国正在进行经济报复。【原文：

On today’s Big Take Asia podcast: Japan’s new prime minister recently raised the issue of support for Taiwan — and now China is retaliating economically.

】

item.title: Petco 上调全年 Adj.
item.description: Petco Health & Wellness Co.上调全年盈利指导后股价攀升，表明其扭亏为盈取得了进展。【原文：Petco Health & Wellness Co. climbed after raising its full-year earnings guidance, signaling progress in its turnaround.】

item.title: 交易员追捧美联储期货，目标是 12 月降息
item.description: 投资者大举押注美联储将在下月召开的决策者会议上再次降息，从而消除了上周还在怀疑美联储会降息的疑虑，为美国债券的上涨奠定了基础。【原文：Investors are betting big that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates again when policymakers meet next month, erasing doubts that had tipped the odds against a move as recently as last week and setting the stage for gains in US bonds.】

item.title: Homeplus 出事后，韩国 PE 行业提议自律
item.description: 在亿万富翁迈克尔-金（Michael Kim）的 MBK Partners 主导的对 Homeplus Co.【原文：South Korea’s private equity fund industry promised new “self-regulation” after a string of controversies including the abortive Homeplus Co. buyout led by billionaire Michael Kim’s MBK Partners shook public confidence and triggered calls for tighter oversight.】
